target.description: Solves a linear equation in two variables based on cost and weight information.
target.name: solve_linear_equation

target.code:
from sympy import symbols, solve

def calculate_costs_and_weights(corn_weight, beans_weight, total_weight, total_cost):
    x = symbols('x')
    y = total_weight - x
    cost = 0.99 * x + 0.45 * y
    return cost == total_cost
target.description: Calculate the weights of various items based on given constraints
target.name: calculate_costs_and_weights
